column4: Dibrugarh East - Nagaghoolie near Ockland Dyke | It was first observed in 8/9/2022 and is reported and afterward ratebof erosion was declined. Due to rainfall in pasighat side again rapid erosion is taking place as reported by Water resource deptt as on 07/10/2022. GPS Coordinates are - 27°31'32.63" N to 94°59'22.16" E | 0
